title: Website-Fonts
content:
Do you Know some website where I can free-Download interesting fonts?  
Thanks!  
Diego
author: egon_my

comments.content: You will probably find something good there : [http://typophile.com/node/14652](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107173129/http:/typophile.com/node/14652 "http://typophile.com/node/14652")

Try [http://www.dafont.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107173129/http:/www.dafont.com/ "http://www.dafont.com/")

There are some nice free fonts available there. Also [http://www.smashingmagazine.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107173129/http:/www.smashingmagazine.com/ "http://www.smashingmagazine.com/") often features the latest free fonts available

thank you so much!! I graduated in architecture but for the past year i've been working as a graphic designer and this is definitely the direction i want to take... i'm really interested in finding new fonts, so if you have any other suggestions i'd be really happy to hear them...  
Diego
Wouldn’t it be better to go Pro after some years, Diego?
